snippet: The parent company of the Boston Red Sox and the English Premier League’s Liverpool F.C. will renovate Anfield, the soccer team’s 120-year-old stadium, rather than build it a new home.
abstract: Steven Cotton essay supports decision by Fenway Sports Group to shelve plans for new stadium in favor of redeveloping Anfield, home of Liverpool FC soccer team; notes that Anfield is a sacred place for Liverpool fans.
lead_paragraph: The parent company of the Boston Red Sox and the English Premier League’s Liverpool F.C. will renovate Anfield, the soccer team’s 120-year-old stadium, rather than build it a new home.

headline.seo: Anfield, Liverpool F.C.’s Historic Stadium, Will Be Renovated
headline.main: Fenway-Style Makeover Would Befit a Soccer Landmark
headline.print_headline: Fenway-Style Makeover Would Befit a Soccer Landmark
